{{Envisaged Echo Intro}}

==Phase I==
===Challenge Objectives===
* Reach successive checkpoints within the time limit

===Special Rules===
* In the "Windborne Bard Phase I" challenge, collecting three Anemo particles will generate a Wind Current.

==Phase II==
===Challenge Objectives===
* Defeat all opponents within the time limit

===Special Rules===
* In the "Windborne Bard Phase II" challenge, {{Color|bp|pullable}} floating bombs will intermittently appear. Attacking these bombs will cause them to explode after a short delay.
* In the "Windborne Bard Phase II" challenge, torches will be extinguished one by one.
